title: Glorious revolution icon

With these augmentations, the subject will be unstoppable. None shall escape its claws. It will pave the way for the glorious evolution. - 1820 RP Subject no longer misses his kind.

body:
A few questions regarding the "Glorious revolution icon" on which you can obtain by "Gifting a Battlecast skin" to a friend.
However I have noticed that riot has not been very clear on the Battle-cast skin part.
I have seen people gifting thier friend Battlecast Xerath,Urgot and also the battlecast ward skin, however gifting these does not seem to let them get the Glorious revolution icon(Waited for more than 24 hours).
If anyone knows on what you have to gift in order to get the icon please respond with help ^.^ Tnx~{{champion:112}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:6}} ?

replies.body: Personally, I got it by gifting the Battlecast Xerath skin. Not sure about ward skins D:
How long did you wait untill ur icon came? Coz my friend hasnt got his and he's waited for about 30+hours -.-

Hey ItzDemo,

It would be best to lodge a support ticket if your icon hasn't come through. You can get the icon from gifting a friend any battlecast skin.
Thanks for the fast reply :) But would the Battlecast ward skin also be illegible for obtaining the icon once gifted?
Does the Battlecast Ward skin count or does it have to be a champion skin?
Yea that is what I am wondering :/
